ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: The snow had gotten worse, even though the hail had nearly stopped, Lunarpine s senses were on full, his nose to the ground. most scents were buried beneath

The snow had gotten worse, even though the hail had nearly stopped, 
Lunarpine's senses were on full, his nose to the ground. most scents 
were buried beneath the snow. He'd lost the predicons scent a while 
back. The cold didn't bother him, being from the arctic north 
helped. "A storm like this isn't normal anywhere." he thought, the 
hot jungle below, would be destroyed by such a climate change.
(Another temporal distortion perhaps.) Again he opened his comm only 
to get static. His senses weren't reliable around here so he 
transformed to bot and continued his search for Shadow Wing. For some 
reason he couldn't shake the fealing he was being watched.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She kept walking.  Her sensors told her a bot was nearing her 
> quardnants.  With the electricity of the storm, it messed with her 
> scanners,  She couldn't tell if it was the Pred or not.  she 
figured 
> it was the Pred.  She looked around for something to hide behind.  
> But it was all flat land and ice. The snow was coming down harder 
> now.  She layed down on the ground.  Soon, the snow would cover her 
> up and hide her.  She figured that if the electricity was messingup 
> her scanners, it would mess with the other bot's as well.  She 
> readied her small gun and waited.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > The wolf continued to follow her trail, he got a partial 
> message,"Hey 
> > Lunarpine, I'll" The message was cut off. He could see a storm 
> > forming in the distance. "She wouldn't." He realized yes she 
would 
> go 
> > into a storm. If he was smart he'd find shelter, but nobody ever 
> > called him smart.
